SEARCH
Module wgu.c195.schedulingsystem
Package wgu.c195.schedulingsystem.database

Class DBQuery

java.lang.Object
wgu.c195.schedulingsystem.database.DBQuery
public abstract class DBQuery extends Object
Main method for interacting with the database performing all appropriate statement preparation and execution actions. Acts as an abstraction layer to provide a common location where all database actions take place in order to make changes apply to every instance simultaneously.

    • validateLogin

      public static boolean validateLogin(String username, String pass) throws SQLException
      Validate a user's login attempt against the database.
      Parameters:
      username - Username to be validated.
      pass - Password to be validated.
      Returns:
      True or false based on user/pass combination found in the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if the database couldn't be accessed.

    • getDBAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getDBAppointments(String filter) throws SQLException
      Get all Appointments from the database.
      Parameters:
      filter - Filtering used to modify the SQL statements to adjust the date of which appointments get returned and displayed in the form.
      Returns:
      ObservableList containing all appointments in the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if the database couldn't be accessed.

    • getDBAppointmentsByCustomerID

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getDBAppointmentsByCustomerID(int c) throws SQLException
      Get all appointments from the database with a matching Customer ID. Used for reports generation.
      Parameters:
      c - Customer ID to be matched against.
      Returns:
      List of all matching appointments.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if the database couldn't be accessed.

    • getDBAppointmentsByUsername

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getDBAppointmentsByUsername(String name) throws SQLException
      Get all appointments from the database with a matching Username. Used for determing 15 minute warning status.
      Parameters:
      name - User to find appointments for.
      Returns:
      List of appointments matching the given Username.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if the database couldn't be accessed.

      Returns:

    • deleteDBCustomer

      public static boolean deleteDBCustomer(Customer c) throws SQLException
      Perform database deletion of a Customer. Checks if there are foreign key restrictions in place and deletes any associated appointments prior to deleting a customer. Displays an informative message after delete has taken place.
      Parameters:
      c - Customer to be deleted from database.
      Returns:
      True or false if the deletion was successful.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if the database couldn't be accessed.

    • deleteDBAppointment

      Returns:
      True or false if the deletion was successful.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if the database couldn't be accessed.

    • findCountry

      protected static Country findCountry(ResultSet results) throws SQLException
      Parse a ResultSet for the required fields to build a Country data class. The next several classes all perform the same action but on different data classes.
      Parameters:
      results - ResultSet to be searched.
      Returns:
      Country record found in the ResultSet
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if the database couldn't be accessed.

    • convertTime

      public static LocalDateTime convertTime(LocalDateTime time, String from, String to)
      Helper function to convert from one timezone to another.
      Parameters:
      time - Takes a LocalDateTime zone-less time.
      from - Takes a String matching a ZoneId
      to - Takes a String matching a ZoneId
      Returns:
      Returns the LocalDateTime FROM the first ZoneId TO the second ZoneId

      Parameters:

      Returns:
